headline: How A. O. Smith Delivers Dividend Stability in the Industrial Sector
summary: A. O. Smith Corporation (NYSE:AOS) is included among the 13 Best Industrial Dividend Stocks to Buy Right Now. The company runs a capital-efficient, high-return business centered around the established and stable North American water heater market, where about 80–85% of demand comes from replacements. In this core market, it holds strong pricing power due to […]
